metadata.title: CVE-2018-20804 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted applyOps invocations. This issue affects:MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.10; v3.6 versionsprior to 3.6.13.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
